title: The Max Step
text: performed Max step saved ML estimates can easily load fetching object station_estimates. plot distribution transformed estimates. \[ \begin{aligned} \psi &= \log(\mu) \\ \tau &= \log(\frac{\sigma}{\mu}) = \log(\sigma) - \log(\mu) \\ \phi &= \mathrm{logit}(\xi, \text{ scale}=1.6) - 0.8 \\ \gamma &= \mathrm{logit}(\Delta, \text{ scale}=0.02) - 0.01. \end{aligned} \] transformations make \(\xi\) can take values \(-0.8\) \(0.8\), \(\Delta\) can take values \(-0.01\) \(0.01\).

title: The Max Step
text: might also interested plotting back-transformed parameters, .e. \(\mu\), \(\sigma\), \(\xi\), \(\Delta\)
